programme.desc: Erine is a smart and hardworking student who has a dream to be able to develop her own skincare business. One day, Erine, who is doing KKN in the village, meets a killer lecturer named Bagas. Although Bagas seems to always demand perfection from Erine as a student to his lecturer, Bagas starts to like Erine. Not just a student and lecturer relationship, it turns out that there is a dark past of Erine that is related to Bagas.

programme.title: Bodyguard Bucin Terkuat Di Muka Bumi Ngajak Kawin
programme.desc: Bara first met Rena by accident and misunderstood her as a pickpocket. They reunited when Bara applied for a job and was asked to be Rena's bodyguard!

programme.title: GADIS MARTABAK HAMPIR BAHAGIA

programme.desc: Sketsa yang membentangkan perkara-perkara yang boleh menyebabkan kemalangan berlaku semasa perjalanan pergi dan pulang bekerja yang disebabkan oleh sikap lewa dan cuai pekerja sendiri semasa melakukan pekerjaan.

programme.title: Akak Akak Sangat - EP 15
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan bual bicara mengenai topik- topik hangat yang akan diperbincangkan dalam keadaan yang kasual.

programme.title: Motif Sosial? - EP 13
programme.desc: Kesinambungan Motif Viral, kali ini melalui eksperimen sosial yang viral dengan penampilan selebriti undangan.

programme.title: Bujang 40 - EP 9
programme.desc: Bujang, 40 tahun, sepanjang hidupnya sudah beberapa kali dia gagal bercinta. Kegagalan ini antara lain disebabkan sikap ibunya yang terlalu mengongkong hidupnya. Ini membuatkan Bujang mengambil keputusan untuk terus membujang

programme.title: NoYa - EP 3
programme.desc: Noya bertujuan untuk mengambil semua kegilaan dan ketawa Aya dan Noreen telah diukir dan membawanya ke peringkat seterusnya.

programme.title: Chapalrela - EP 11
programme.desc: Anjang Merah kematian ibu dan terpaksa tinggal dengan ibu tirinya, Mak Jenab dan saudara tirinya Jali Puteh. Anjang Merah sentiasa didera juga ditugaskan menjaga kandang kambing ayahnya, Pak Manap.

programme.title: Diva Dari Jakarta
programme.desc: Erin dan Ejot sering dibandingkan dari segi paras rupa. Sehingga suatu hari sesuatu telah berlaku kepada Erin yang mengubah segalanya.

programme.title: Opera Sabun Boboi - EP 7
programme.desc: Pertunjukan komedi lakaran yang memaparkan kemasyhuran pelawak Afdlin Shauki dan Harun Salim Bachik dari Boboi.

programme.title: Sepahtu Reunion Live 2019 - EP 14
programme.desc: Sepahtu kembali menghiburkan anda sekeluarga.

programme.title: Fan Fanatik - EP 7
programme.desc: Menampilkan dua pasukan yang terdiri daripada ahli kelab peminat selebriti tempatan bersaing di antara satu sama lain bagi mendapatkan takhta fan fanatik.

programme.title: Motif Sosial? - EP 13
programme.desc: Kesinambungan Motif Viral, kali ini melalui eksperimen sosial yang viral dengan penampilan selebriti undangan.

programme.title: Kiah The Spy - EP 9

programme.title: Mind Your Loghat - EP 9
programme.desc: Rancangan masakan yang memartabatkan dialek, budaya dan makanan asli. Dua selebriti akan menyediakan hidangan dari kampung halaman dan mesti bercakap dengan dialek negeri mereka.

programme.title: Betul Ke Bohong? S4 - EP 10
programme.desc: Panel selebriti memilih jawapan berdasarkan kenyataan dan cerita yang mungkin benar atau tidak, 2 kumpulan berentap untuk perolehi markah tertinggi.

programme.title: Lawak Ke Der Tak Coverline - EP 10
programme.desc: Lawak Ke Der Tak Coverline merupakan sebuah rancangan bual bicara yang menampilkan pelawak-pelawak terkenal Malaysia dan dihoskan oleh Hans Isaac.

programme.title: My Sweet RT - EP 2
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang wanita bernama Mona. Dia adalah wanita yang suka motosikal, dan juga suka bertengkar, jadi dia digelar wanita yang kuat.

programme.title: Bocey & Friends - EP 12
programme.desc: Dalang Prank kembali dalam musim kedua bersama hos Dato' AC Mizal dan artis-artis jemputan setiap minggu. Saksikan siapa Dalang untuk minggu ini.

programme.title: Sorry, Sengaja! - EP 8

programme.title: Ek Eleh! Afdlin! Afdlin - EP 6

programme.title: Siapa-Siapa Itu? - EP 5
programme.desc: Berkonsep kan kejutan dimana selebriti akan menyanyikan lagu duet dengan pasangan duet mereka tanpa dijangka. Selebriti tersebut akan meneka siapa disebalik suara misteri itu.

programme.title: Sorok - Sorok - EP 13
programme.desc: Sebuah program menarik untuk tontonan semua.

programme.title: Travel Lawak - EP 13

programme.title: Lawak Minggu Ini - EP 9

programme.title: Isteri Halal - EP 32

programme.title: Hasrat Tersirat - EP 18
programme.desc: Jarang-jarang untuk keluarga Hamzah berkumpul bersama-sama. Namun, kebahagiaan mereka tidak panjang. Hamzah menjadi bingung selepas menerima sebuah panggilan.

programme.title: When I Get Home My Wife Always Pretends To Be Dead

programme.title: Poongodi
programme.desc: Poongodi rises above her father's male chauvinism, intent on proving herself & pursuing a college education. Her path crosses with Saravanan, a naïve young man who blindly trusts his manipulative stepmother. Uncover the fate of the two kindred souls.

programme.title: Punitha
programme.desc: Maragatham holds her step-daughter Punitha dear, to the point of being overbearing. However, their bond turns twisted & burdened when Punitha finds her soulmate, Kabilan. Amidst family betrayals, can Punitha show her mother the true meaning of love?

programme.title: MANAMAGALE VAA
programme.desc: Narmada's mission to her ancestral village to reunite her father & his estranged family entwines with Kathir's task of finding suitable grooms for his three sisters. What unfolds when they fall in love, striving for a cause against the same enemy?

programme.title: VINODHINI
programme.desc: When her husband, a soldier, disappears in a military accident, Vinothini never loses hope, firmly believing he'll come back. Join her inspiring journey as she cares for his family & meets life's hardships as a single mother with resilience & love

programme.title: PUTHU VASANTHAM
programme.desc: Raised as a single child, Selvi longs for the loving embrace & heart-warming bond of a joint family. And when her dream comes true, watch her battle all odds & win over her husband's large family.

programme.title: ilakkiya

programme.title: LAKSHMI
programme.desc: Maha, her family’s financial backbone, marries Selvam, on condition that she will continue to support her family financially even after marriage. Post which they confront challenges that put the family’s peace and happiness to test.

programme.title: Lebowitz Contre Lebowitz - EP 2
programme.desc: Paule defends a man who was the victim of domestic violence and had accidentally killed his partner. She asks a colleague, Maitre Carbon, to offer Irene a job. But just as Paule thinks she's saved her company by firing her, Irene earns some serious money for Carbon.

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes - EP 28
programme.desc: This drama is unfolding silently before our eyes: countless animal species are becoming extinct. Whole swathes of wildlife are disappearing at an unprecedented rate on every continent. What does the world map of threatened species reveal? And what can we still save?

programme.title: Le Combat D'alice
programme.desc: Alice, aged 16, is deeply affected by the death of her mother. While staying with her grandparents, she gets attached to a calf before realising that it is destined for the slaughterhouse. Unable to bear the thought, she commits herself body and soul to the militant cause against animal suffering.

Each episode features an iconic guest and a series of special reports, allowing viewers to discover or rediscover France, its young designers, and its chic and trendy hang-outs.

programme.title: Chroniques D'en Haut - EP 10
programme.desc: Les Contamines, on the south-western slopes of the Mont Blanc Massif, is home to Europe's highest nature reserve. Laurent Guillaume and the local ranger Geoffrey Garcel, head off for an autumnal hike through the heart of the Montjoie Valley.

programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: C'est Du Belge - EP 5
programme.desc: Gerald Watelet shines the spotlight on the people putting Belgium on the map. Expect reports on the best culture and heritage ambassadors, behind-the-scenes glimpses of elite events and profiles of those making headlines.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1683
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: La Cote A Vol D'oiseau
programme.desc: Departing from the Zwin Nature Park in Belgium, on the border with the Netherlands, a flight over the Belgian coast is an opportunity to discover the great ballet of bird migrations heading south to the French dunes.

programme.title: C'est Succulent ! - EP 3
programme.desc: Leila Albert welcomes Beatrice Riegel to her kitchen, who concocts her simple, economical recipe that her family loves: spaetzle gratin with tomme cheese. A heart-warming autumn dish, made with local produce and the famous Alsatian pasta.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 22
programme.desc: Passionate about French chic, ambassadress Katherina Marx surrounds herself with major figures from the worlds of fashion, design, gastronomy, and fine living. Each episode features an iconic guest and a series of special reports, allowing viewers to discover or rediscover France, its young designers, and its chic and trendy hang-outs.

programme.title: Les Mots De La Paix
programme.desc: Crises, coups, wars, transnational threats, outside interference, global warming: the stability of Africa and the safety of the civil populations are in danger. Via twenty words, the political scientist Niagale Bagayoko analyses the current security challenges and dynamics.

programme.title: Partie De Campagne - EP 50
programme.desc: Surrounded by fields, near a vast forest and a pretty stream, lies the village of Bellefontaine. It's home to the fun-loving gang of friends Raphael, Lina, P'tit Pied and Grande Perche. Bubbling over with imagination, they fill every day with exciting adventures.

programme.title: Yetili - EP 11
programme.desc: Nina and Leon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yetili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yetili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Dessine Les Animaux Avec Koumi - EP 28
programme.desc: Koumi is 6 years old, mischievous and always full of fun. The dream of her life is to know all the animals of the world, and she absolutely loves drawing! In each episode she explains how to draw animals really well.

programme.title: L'afrik En Contes - EP 21
programme.desc: A woman unable to have children asks the genie of the backwater to please give her one. She calls her Mardi. There is only one rule, the little girl must never go and play in the water.

programme.title: L'afrik En Contes - EP 22
programme.desc: Little Moheli is unhappy because his father's new wife beats him. On day, he comes across a magical cocoa bean. When he rubs it a genie appears and offers him a wish.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Itineraires Paysans - EP 1
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Temps Present

programme.title: Le Journal International
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Climat : Des Resistants En Outre-Mer
programme.desc: The overseas territories are home to 90% of France's biodiversity: an invaluable heritage now at risk. From Reunion to the Polynesian islands, from Guiana to the Antilles, local people are raising the alarm and joining forces to propose innovative solutions. A close-up look at this environmental vanguard.

programme.title: Tendance XXI - EP 23
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Echappees Belles - EP 5
programme.desc: Sophie Jovillard, Jerome Pitorin, Ismael Khelifa and Tiga embark the traveller that lies within each of us for a fabulous breath of fresh air! programme.title: Rassemblance - EP 16
programme.desc: Marie-Francoise has led a life of feminist commitment from a very early age. After working to rebuild her country, Haiti, she was forced to leave Port-au-Prince with her children. In Quebec, she is continuing her combat, focusing on helping isolated women.

programme.title: Lebowitz Contre Lebowitz - EP 1
programme.desc: After rescuing the firm's finances, Paule tries to work out how to resolve Warnier's legal difficulties. She also has to continue to cope with Irene, totally overwhelmed with her new baby. Seeing an opportunity to get rid of her, Paule offers her to buy her stake in the company.

programme.title: Lebowitz Contre Lebowitz - EP 2
programme.desc: Paule defends a man who was the victim of domestic violence and had accidentally killed his partner. She asks a colleague, Maitre Carbon, to offer Irene a job. But just as Paule thinks she's saved her company by firing her, Irene earns some serious money for Carbon.

programme.title: Carbone - EP 5

programme.desc: Gabby Agbonlahor sits down for 1-to-11 to reveal his ultimate Aston Villa lineup, made up of the teammates he played alongside. His Villa XI is full of character, quality, and claret-and-blue pride.

programme.title: MATCH OFFICIALS MIC'D UP - TUES 11 NOV
programme.desc: Join PGMOL Chief Refereeing Officer Howard Webb and former Premier League star Michael Owen, as they use previously un-released audio from the on-field officials and VAR teams to explain refereeing decisions. This ground-breaking broadcast will feature the in-game audio of selected incidents from the 2025/26 season.

programme.desc: We delve into the remarkable journey of Sunderland AFC; a club defined by its dramatic highs and painful lows. From their proud top-flight legacy to the heartbreak of consecutive relegations, Sunderland's story is one of resilience, identity, and unbreakable community spirit. Now, under the leadership of new head coach Regis Le Bris, the Black Cats are preparing for a new chapter.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 13
programme.desc: Since joining Crystal Palace in 2021 from Mainz, Jean-Phillipe Mateta has gone on to make over 100 appearances for the Eagles and has established himself as a key figure in Oliver Glasner's side. Leading the line in both of their recent FA Cup and Community Shield triumphs, Mateta also won Silver at the 2024 Olympic Games with France.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 23
programme.desc: Still regarded as a legend in his native Belgium, Luc Nilis lit up the Pro League and Dutch football, winning numerous titles and cups with Anderlecht and PSV Eindhoven. His 2000 move to Aston Villa looked set to make him a Premier League star, but instead, it almost ended in tragedy. We catch up with the former striker to hear his incredible story and discover how his new role in coaching has become his biggest challenge yet.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Manon Fiorot vs. Mellony Guegjes
programme.desc: This episode features coverage of the TF2 women's flyweight finale between Manon Fiorot and Mellony Guegjes. Bonus coverage includes Adrian Sanchez vs. Serge Kasanda.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Timothy Bradley vs. Devon Alexander
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a battle of unbeaten junior welterweights to unify the WBC and WBO world titles as Timothy Bradley, aka 'Desert Storm', (26-0, 11 KOs) faces Devon Alexander 'The Great' (21-1, 13 KOs). This fight took place at the Silverdome in Pontiac, Michigan, USA on January 29, 2011.

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts
programme.desc: This episode features highlights from the Women's Weapons Championship as well as Boys Forms, Synchronized Team Weapons and a World Record Break.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best of the Judo Grand Prix from Antalya, speak with Lukas Krpalek about his move to +100 kg weight class, and get a demonstration on how to preform the popular ride and roll counter attack.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Adrien Broner vs. Jason Litzau
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is then-undefeated Adrien Broner taking on Jason Litzau in a fight that ends with a first-round TKO. Also on the card, action from light welterweight champ Amir Khan.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 1 featuring Goeido, Shodai, Takayasu and Ichinojo from the Haru basho, 2018.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 6: Bandung, Indonesia - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Pencak Silat and the Martial Art of Hands, Feet, Throws and Weapons featuring Masters Rita Suwanda and Dadang Gunawan.

programme.desc: This episode features coverage of the TF2 women's flyweight finale between Manon Fiorot and Mellony Guegjes. Bonus coverage includes Adrian Sanchez vs. Serge Kasanda.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Timothy Bradley vs. Devon Alexander
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a battle of unbeaten junior welterweights to unify the WBC and WBO world titles as Timothy Bradley, aka 'Desert Storm', (26-0, 11 KOs) faces Devon Alexander 'The Great' (21-1, 13 KOs). This fight took place at the Silverdome in Pontiac, Michigan, USA on January 29, 2011.

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts
programme.desc: This episode features highlights from the Women's Weapons Championship as well as Boys Forms, Synchronized Team Weapons and a World Record Break.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best of the Judo Grand Prix from Antalya, speak with Lukas Krpalek about his move to +100 kg weight class, and get a demonstration on how to preform the popular ride and roll counter attack.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Adrien Broner vs. Jason Litzau
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is then-undefeated Adrien Broner taking on Jason Litzau in a fight that ends with a first-round TKO. Also on the card, action from light welterweight champ Amir Khan.

programme.title: WCCB David Benavidez vs. Demetrius Andrade
programme.desc: From the Michelob Ultra Arena in Las Vegas, two undefeated Super Middleweights square off when David Benavidez meets Demetrius Andrade for the WBC Interim World Championship. Benavidez is 27-0, with a list of impressive victories including a recent win over Caleb Plant to establish himself as one of the top rated fighters in the division. Andrade, the former Middleweight World Champion, is also without a loss at 32-0, and now looks to add a championship at Super Middleweight.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 92
programme.desc: It's time to wake up but Tinky Winky isn't feeling well. Soon, Tinky Winky feels better but now Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po don't feel well.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S5) - EP 12
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'raspberry' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. Today is all about raspberries - we see a red raspberry, a small raspberry, a fancy hat raspberry and a high raspberry.

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 7
programme.desc: Helping Hand builds a bandstand, so Mae-Mae decides to form a band with her friends.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S2) - EP 26
programme.desc: Zam invents a machine that makes it possible to go inside other people's dreams - what a trip! However, when Zoom has a bad dream in time, will Messy and his friends from OKIDO be able to save him?

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 44
programme.desc: In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 43
programme.desc: In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 17
programme.desc: The Squirrels want to get a World Record, but in what? And Duggee is too busy to help. "If only we had more Duggee's" muses Tag. Which gives Norrie a record-breaking idea...

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 16
programme.desc: The Squirrels build the best rollercoaster anyone ever saw. From a sweet song, to spinning through a helix, and getting the full G-force, it's a ride Duggee's going to remember!

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 6
programme.desc: At Squirrel Club, Duggee forgets how to woof, Duggly comes to visit, Roly celebrates Potato Time, and Billy teaches everyone the Bugatron dance!

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 7
programme.desc: Betty recalls the first time she pushed the red button, the Squirrels explore a range of emotions with Happy, Angry Bull tells a not-so-sleepy bedtime story, and the gerbils sing.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 43
programme.desc: After Glitch accidentally destroys part of the Academy, he and Ubercorn have a huge argument. When he heads to Grim HQ to make amends, Ubercorn is accidentally trapped.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 30
programme.desc: Bluey's house has fairies! Tails are being braided, stickers are everywhere, and Mum's got a peg beard. Now the family must band together to hunt for these invisible mischief-makers.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 33
programme.desc: Mum, Dad, and Bingo must complete both their classes to pass swim school, but pleasing strict Big Fish instructor Margaret (aka Bluey) is proving to be very difficult.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions (S1) - EP 6
programme.desc: On Jen's birthday she and Andy are sent to follow a new baby elephant to make sure it can use it's trunk properly.

programme.title: Dog Squad (S3) - EP 10
programme.desc: Rayane, Karim and Luca are having a sleepover when hearing dog Diesel is woken in the middle of the night by a strange hissing noise. Is there a slithery snake in the kitchen?

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild (S1) - EP 12
programme.desc: Steve and Aneeshwar meet an enormous ostrich, the biggest bird species in the world. Then, they go to feed their second animal, a penguin, and tell us all about their surprising connection.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S7) - EP 4
programme.desc: Captain Captain doesn't think her new crew, Sandy and Seaweed, are up to the job. Unless they can both convince her that they should stay, she is going to send them back to the Pirate Agency. Sandy and Seaweed decide to write a special song all about them in order to persuade Captain Captain that they should remain as her crew.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 46
programme.desc: The squirrels are playing in the clubhouse. Naughty Monkey arrives and causes chaos! He later returns to his home to relax when there is a knock at his door. It's his cousins, come to visit.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 45
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels are out on a walk in the countryside. Its been a long walk and the squirrels are starting to get tired, but it's a long way back. Don't worry, Duggee has his singing badge.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 44
programme.desc: The squirrels go to see what Duggee is doing but on the way Tag stumbles on some toy blocks and hurts his knee. How can they make him feel better? Happy's mum says laughter is the best medicine.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 13
programme.desc: Glitch fills Cheddar Gorge with a river of melted cheese, turning it into a giant cheese fondue. Can the Go Jetters rescue the tourists and sheep from the cheesiest glitch ever?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 12
programme.desc: Glitch's plans to open a hotel on an unspoilt beach in Thailand go horribly wrong when a group of macaque monkeys steal his Grim-o-freeze gun.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S24) - EP 15
programme.desc: Gordon and Rebecca do the same work, but go about it differently, and when Rebecca tries to be more like Gordon, it doesn't go well.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 21
programme.desc: Sarah's hair keeps getting in her way, so it's time for a trip to the hairdressers.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 23
programme.desc: Stumbling across an arcade, Sarah takes on a dancing challenge with John, whilst Duck and Flamingo team up to try and defeat a video game!

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 46
programme.desc: Fred, Fifi and Ari call Stanley to help them with their recycling drive by coming up with a way of repurposing all the towns' old stuff. Stanley makes a crazy golf course!

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 45
programme.desc: Myrtle, Sophie and Benjamin call Stanley to teach them how to make a sandcastle. Myrtle asks for a bigger one, so big it turns into a sandcastle resort!

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 27
programme.desc: Monty doesn't think he is similar to anyone else in his family and wonders whether everyone in a family should be alike.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: JoJo tries to grow a daffodil but is disheartened to learn that it will take a long time to bloom. Cynthia and Gran Gran show JoJo how to take care of it and the best way to measure its growth.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 19
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo make mud pizzas and deliver them to the grown-ups, but their pedal car's wheel keeps falling off.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 20
programme.desc: With only five minutes to play 'Driving', Bluey and Mum race against the clock to buy milk for a grumpy guest and have to escape an angry shopkeeper.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 21
programme.desc: Tired of being told what to do, Bluey and Bingo enlist their giant invisible friend Tina to show Mum and Dad who's boss. Now they can do anything they want, until Mum and Dad rebel.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 49
programme.desc: Duggee and the squirrels are enjoying a day at the beach, when they encounter the Penguins who explain they were on a very important mission when they got sick.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 48
programme.desc: Gerbie the snake is on holiday and would like to see all the beautiful sights. Duggee can help, he does have his Tour Guide badge!

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 13
programme.desc: At Squirrel Club, there's a story told in blocks, the tale of a first tooth, a fable about changing emotions, and a yarn involving the Squirrels as puppets.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 43
programme.desc: After Glitch accidentally destroys part of the Academy, he and Ubercorn have a huge argument. When he heads to Grim HQ to make amends, Ubercorn is accidentally trapped.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits (S1) - EP 14
programme.desc: Live from the Roots & Fruits Theatre, Tomato changes colour.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits (S1) - EP 13
programme.desc: Raspberry sings a song, saying it's cool to be kind.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 46

programme.desc: The Squirrels want to get a World Record, but in what? And Duggee is too busy to help. "If only we had more Duggee's" muses Tag. Which gives Norrie a record-breaking idea...

programme.desc: Glitch has taken Tala on holiday to Slovenia's Postojna Caves, and she is looking forward to finding a rare creature called an olm for her class project. Ubercorn and Lars join them.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 31
programme.desc: In a game of 'Work', Dad hires Bluey and Bingo at his drainpipe factory. But when Bluey takes charge, Dad finds his new boss pretty tough, especially her no dancing rule.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 34
programme.desc: In the park, Bluey meets a new playmate named Winnie, but when Bluey wants to invite her and her dad home for breakfast, she learns that adults take a little bit longer to make friends.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions (S1) - EP 7
programme.desc: In this episode Andy, Jen and Scout head to New Zealand on a baby animal mission to help rescue a family of blue ducks and their chicks from a fast flowing river. Along the way, Andy takes a ride on a pukeko chick and meets a hedgehog.

programme.title: Dog Squad (S3) - EP 11
programme.desc: When Guide dog Kika has a waggy tail-related accident with a purple smoothie, she and her owner Dr Amit visit the Woofton Library of Things to borrow a carpet cleaner.

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild (S1) - EP 13
programme.desc: Steve and Aneeshwar set up a new toy for a tiger. They then hold an amazing leaf insect and find out how this tiny creature has something in common with the tiger.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S7) - EP 5
programme.desc: Sandy and Seaweed have invented a new game knocking down bottles with coconuts; they have called it 'Bowling'.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 47
programme.desc: Bing Bong - there's somebody at the door. It's delivery Chipmunk with a parcel for Duggee, but why is it wrapped up like a present? Maybe its Duggee's birthday!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 46
programme.desc: The squirrels are playing in the clubhouse. Naughty Monkey arrives and causes chaos! He later returns to his home to relax when there is a knock at his door. It's his cousins, come to visit.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 45
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels are out on a walk in the countryside. Its been a long walk and the squirrels are starting to get tired, but it's a long way back. Don't worry, Duggee has his singing badge.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 14
programme.desc: The Go Jetters race to save a family of mountain gorillas from traps left by hunters and also from a sneezy Grandmaster Glitch's germs.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 44
programme.desc: Glitch has taken Tala on holiday to Slovenia's Postojna Caves, and she is looking forward to finding a rare creature called an olm for her class project. Ubercorn and Lars join them.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 31
programme.desc: In a game of 'Work', Dad hires Bluey and Bingo at his drainpipe factory. But when Bluey takes charge, Dad finds his new boss pretty tough, especially her no dancing rule.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 34
programme.desc: In the park, Bluey meets a new playmate named Winnie, but when Bluey wants to invite her and her dad home for breakfast, she learns that adults take a little bit longer to make friends.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions (S1) - EP 7
programme.desc: In this episode Andy, Jen and Scout head to New Zealand on a baby animal mission to help rescue a family of blue ducks and their chicks from a fast flowing river. Along the way, Andy takes a ride on a pukeko chick and meets a hedgehog.

programme.title: Dog Squad (S3) - EP 11
programme.desc: When Guide dog Kika has a waggy tail-related accident with a purple smoothie, she and her owner Dr Amit visit the Woofton Library of Things to borrow a carpet cleaner.

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild (S1) - EP 13
programme.desc: Steve and Aneeshwar set up a new toy for a tiger. They then hold an amazing leaf insect and find out how this tiny creature has something in common with the tiger.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S7) - EP 5
programme.desc: Sandy and Seaweed have invented a new game knocking down bottles with coconuts; they have called it 'Bowling'.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 47
programme.desc: Bing Bong - there's somebody at the door. It's delivery Chipmunk with a parcel for Duggee, but why is it wrapped up like a present? Maybe its Duggee's birthday!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 46
programme.desc: The squirrels are playing in the clubhouse. Naughty Monkey arrives and causes chaos! He later returns to his home to relax when there is a knock at his door. It's his cousins, come to visit.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 45
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels are out on a walk in the countryside. Its been a long walk and the squirrels are starting to get tired, but it's a long way back. Don't worry, Duggee has his singing badge.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 14
programme.desc: The Go Jetters race to save a family of mountain gorillas from traps left by hunters and also from a sneezy Grandmaster Glitch's germs.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 13
programme.desc: Glitch fills Cheddar Gorge with a river of melted cheese, turning it into a giant cheese fondue. Can the Go Jetters rescue the tourists and sheep from the cheesiest glitch ever?

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S24) - EP 16
programme.desc: When Kenji hears that he must travel home to Japan alone, he gets scared and tries to hide. So, Thomas sets out to find him

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 22
programme.desc: After their snacks go missing, Sergeant Sarah & Constable Quack are on the trail of a biscuit burglar.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 24
programme.desc: Mars tries to fill in for a missing Moon, but needs a little coaching from Sarah & Duck.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 47
programme.desc: Benjamin and Sophie have a new bug friend. Stanley helps build a bug feeder which attracts lots more bugs. They eat so much; Stanley gets more food and builds a Bug Hotel for them.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 46
programme.desc: Fred, Fifi and Ari call Stanley to help them with their recycling drive by coming up with a way of repurposing all the towns' old stuff. Stanley makes a crazy golf course!

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 28
programme.desc: Monty wonders if it is possible to feel both happy and sad at the same time.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) - EP 10
programme.desc: A photo of Gran Gran and JoJo's mummy when she was a little girl inspires them to take a walk and compare old photos of their neighbourhood to see how it has changed over time.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 20
programme.desc: With only five minutes to play 'Driving', Bluey and Mum race against the clock to buy milk for a grumpy guest and have to escape an angry shopkeeper.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 21
programme.desc: Tired of being told what to do, Bluey and Bingo enlist their giant invisible friend Tina to show Mum and Dad who's boss. Now they can do anything they want, until Mum and Dad rebel.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 22
programme.desc: Bluey promises her customer, Bingo, the best tour ever in a game of Whale Watching, but they need Mum and Dad to join in, and they are too tired to play after a late night.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 50
programme.desc: Roly is digging in the garden when his spade suddenly hits something. It's a key. But what does it do? Duggee has his key badge, they can find out through trial and error.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 49
programme.desc: Duggee and the squirrels are enjoying a day at the beach, when they encounter the Penguins who explain they were on a very important mission when they got sick.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: At Squirrel Club, Detective Puppy solves the mystery of a missing biscuit, the Rabbits tell us what's cool, and the Squirrels help Delivery Chipmunk with a huge parcel.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 44
programme.desc: Glitch has taken Tala on holiday to Slovenia's Postojna Caves, and she is looking forward to finding a rare creature called an olm for her class project. Ubercorn and Lars join them.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits (S1) - EP 15
programme.desc: Live from the Roots & Fruits theatre, it's tiny Brussels Sprout performing I'm Mighty and proving how great he is.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits (S1) - EP 14
programme.desc: Live from the Roots & Fruits Theatre, Tomato changes colour.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 47
programme.desc: Evil Pea is tricked by lots of Supertatoes who appear all over the supermarket.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 48
programme.desc: The Cobs have finally had enough of Evil Pea's ungratefulness and team up with Supertato.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 94
programme.desc: The Teletubbies go on a day trip to the Hidey Hup. They take turns on The Tubby Bouncy, The Tubby Slidey and The Tubby Spinny before they go on The Tubby Uppy Downy together.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S5) - EP 14
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'grass' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. Today, we see lots of grass - green grass, soft grass, spiky grass, growing grass and mowing grass.

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: Hooper has planned a beach day for his friends. Phoebe is worried that Hooper might need help, so she tries to organise the day for him.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S2) - EP 2
programme.desc: Mayor Oki and Geoffrey are making a lot of noise in the election for the next Mayor of OKIDO.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 46
programme.desc: In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 45
programme.desc: In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 19
programme.desc: From sensible chuckles and nervous giggles to Duggee's infectious laughter, once everyone starts, it's so hard to stop. What were they laughing about again? Anyone remember?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 18
programme.desc: What are the rules about being in charge? Make a plan, keep everyone happy, make decisions, lead by example and listen. Roly takes that one so seriously he gets a bit overwhelmed.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 8
programme.desc: Spring has sprung! There are cute baby animals to meet and frolic with.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: Spot the odd one out or guess who lives here. A great memory tip from Duggee, an edition of The Agony and Eggstacy, and how to draw Enid - down to her last whisker.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 45
programme.desc: The Go Jetters are upset after hearing of the species that need help. Ubercorn tries to cheer them up by planning a visit to the forests of Sao Paulo.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 32
programme.desc: Bingo is sick in hospital, so Bluey and Dad sent her a homemade video to lift her spirits. It tells the tale of Barnicus' quest to heal her spotty dog named Bumpy.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 35
programme.desc: When Mum and Dad have a disagreement, Bluey makes Dad write a love letter to Mum to make up. Bluey must find a way to play Ground's Lava with Bingo and deliver the letter to Mum, without squabbling.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions (S1) - EP 8

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S24) - EP 17
programme.desc: Inventor Ruth has a new steam powered car to try out. But Cleo the car is headstrong and when Thomas challenges her to a race she takes some risks to guarantee a win.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 23
programme.desc: Stumbling across an arcade, Sarah takes on a dancing challenge with John, whilst Duck and Flamingo team up to try and defeat a video game!

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 25
programme.desc: Sarah & Duck try to help Donkey get his jumping confidence back by building a surprise for him in their back garden.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 48
programme.desc: Myrtle calls Stanley to see if she can practice her first aid skills on him, but he's all fit and healthy. Instead, they go about the town making good use of Myrtle's newfound abilities.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 47
programme.desc: Benjamin and Sophie have a new bug friend. Stanley helps build a bug feeder which attracts lots more bugs. They eat so much; Stanley gets more food and builds a Bug Hotel for them.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 29
programme.desc: When Jimmy Jones falls asleep doing some cloud-gazing, Monty wonders what animals dream about.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) - EP 11
programme.desc: Gran Gran busts a groove when she teaches JoJo the moves to a traditional Saint Lucian dance. JoJo finds that learning a dance can take time, before realising she can put her own twist on it.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 21
programme.desc: Tired of being told what to do, Bluey and Bingo enlist their giant invisible friend Tina to show Mum and Dad who's boss. Now they can do anything they want, until Mum and Dad rebel.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 22
programme.desc: Bluey promises her customer, Bingo, the best tour ever in a game of Whale Watching, but they need Mum and Dad to join in, and they are too tired to play after a late night.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 23
programme.desc: When Dad's accused of fluffing in Bluey's face as he climbed out of bed, he's put on trial with Mum as the judge, and Bluey and Bingo as witnesses. Bluey might also have to explain what she was doing there.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 51
programme.desc: Duggee's uniform is a bit old and needs to be updated. Duggee can make his own clothes!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 50

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 2

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 45
programme.desc: The Go Jetters are upset after hearing of the species that need help. Ubercorn tries to cheer them up by planning a visit to the forests of Sao Paulo.

programme.desc: Little artichoke sings about being the rhyming queen.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits (S1) - EP 15

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 - EP 229
programme.desc: Peppa and George are painting. Daddy shows them how to mix paints and the three of them paint a beautiful picture of a cherry tree. Everything is going very well, until the ducks turn up and decide to run through the paint and all over the painting.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 - EP 230
programme.desc: Daddy Pig winds up the old cuckoo clock. When a wooden cuckoo pops out singing "Cuckoo!", Peppa thinks it is very funny, but George has missed the whole thing. George does not want to miss the cuckoo again but the cuckoo only pops out once an hour.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 - EP 231
programme.desc: Peppa and her family are going for a day's cycle ride. Peppa loves cycling downhill but she's not so keen on peddling uphill. So, when the family meet all of Peppa's friends and decide to have a race, Peppa insists it should be a down hill race.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 - EP 233
programme.desc: Peppa and George are at the dentist. Dr Elephant says that Peppa and George's teeth are lovely and clean. But George's plastic toy "Mr Dinosaur" teeth are a bit yellow. Dr Elephant polishes Mr Dinosaurs teeth until they are bright and shiny.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 - EP 234

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 20
programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 21
programme.desc: After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: Where's Wally? S2 - EP 34
programme.desc: It’s Halloween time and the Wanderers get a WanderPost from Odlulu issuing a challenge: "Come to my Haunted House in Wales… if you dare!" Wally and Wenda, aren’t scared by Odlulu and Fritz’s attempt at creating a haunted house with goofy Halloween decorations. So Odlulu uses the magical Haunted House Key to bring a few of the decorations to life.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S3 - EP 112
programme.desc: Buttercup and Daisy decide that it only rains when the sky is upset. They set about trying to cheer the sky up

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S3 - EP 113
programme.desc: Primrose has composed a song for Violet but is upset when the twins break her guitar. How will she sing for Violet now? Could the twins have the answer…

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 - EP 21
programme.desc: Rupert and the others meet a sad little scarecrow who's lonely and upset that the crows don't come near him.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 - EP 22
programme.desc: Ping Pong's magic accidentally brings a picture of an Octopus to life and the friends need to stop it causing chaos.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 47
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Skunk didn't smell. Skunk smelt as sweet as sweet can be. Infact, whenever any animal had a smelly problem they went straight to Skunk. And then one day naughty Baboon tricks Skunk into tasting the yucky Smellyfruit! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 48
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Cricket didn't chirrup. Infact Cricket didn't do anything at all and it was beginning to get him down. Every animal has a use. Elephant trumpets, Lion roars...but what does Cricket do? And then one day Cricket discovers that he has rhythm. Cricket finds the beat! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 25
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a recipe for dandelion soup and a soup bowl, she discovers Kitty Fairy is sick! Gabby and Pandy make her some delicious dandelion soup and while she rests, they take care of her Garden. With the help of all the Gabby Cats, they water the Singing Flowers, help the Rainbow Kitty Bushes regain their color, and sing some fussy Itty Bitty Blossoms a lullaby. For our Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Kitty Fairy sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: The dollhouse delivery is a spaceship that takes off with a sleeping CatRat inside! Gabby, Pandy, and Kitty Fairy have to get the ship back into The Fairy Tail Garden before Floyd (who thinks it's the best kitty toy ever!) gets his paws on it!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S2 - EP 28
programme.desc: Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S2 - EP 29
programme.desc: There’s a new "babblist" in town- someone who claims to understand baby talk. Boss Baby spots this fraud right away;and must debunk his tactics before he scams the playgroup parents. Meanwhile;Tim tries to sell magazines with Boss Baby’s help.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 20
programme.desc: When Grug overhears Thunk accidentally call Phil "Dad", he tries to reconnect with Thunk by taking him to the natural spectacle known as "Big Shine."

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 - EP 22
programme.desc: Alex and Eugene find themselves at odds with Tom and their fellow dragon riders when Feathers and Webmaster go missing during a blizzard in the Ice Realm.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 8
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items - but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! S2 - EP 28
programme.desc: When Poppy worries that her father doesn’t feel useful now that’s he’s no longer King, she asks her friends to bring Peppy small problems to solve. But will Peppy be able to face a real threat, in the form of a swamp monster?/When Cloud Guy moves into Branch’s bunker, Branch will do whatever it takes to get his unwanted roommate to leave- including inviting his annoying cloud parents over.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a new camera that takes pictures with silly filters, CatRat uses it to lead Gabby, Pandy, and the Gabby Cats on a photographic scavenger hunt around the dollhouse!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes masks and capes for her and Pandy, they become the dollhouse defenders and must save the Gabby Cats from Bad Guy CatRat! In the Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Kitty Fairy sings a song about her garden magic!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Kelp and Pixie forget about their little sisters and their plans to hang out. Scallop goes to Unicorn Land and meets Juniper. They play and become friends. / The unicorns are eager to play with a new mystery item that washes up on the beach, but what is it? While the other unicorns come up with imaginative ideas of what it could be, Pixie is determined to find out exactly what it is.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: When Pixie’s pet crab goes into a cave, Kelp uses his knowledge of crabs under the sea to coax him out using dance and rhythm. / Scallop’s special shell is broken, but Kelp transforms the broken bits into something even more special.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: Mr. Tanaka is moving places all by himself, so Team Zenko step in to assist, and learn the importance of asking people for help. / When Sam's skateboard competition falls on the same day as her favourite creator Ken KaBlam's comic book signing, TZG secretly prevents him leaving town before she gets the chance to meet him.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: When easily-distracted Luis is tasked with getting flowers for his grandmother's birthday party, TZG secretly keeps him on track. / When Rodney's honey bees escape from their apiary (artificial beehive), TZG secretly brings them back.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Burple gets spooked by the legend of a ghost called the Phantom Fang. But when he senses the story is real, he can't get his friends to believe him.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: After Magnus accuses Cutter of setting fires near the village that could hurt the sheep, the Riders have to put them out and find the real culprit.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S3 - EP 55
programme.desc: When the famous headless horse shows up in town, the San Lorenzans must turn to an unlikely hero to help save the day.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S3 - EP 56
programme.desc: When a kind, gentle Demon with dreams of being evil emerges from the portal, Puss and the team do their best to teach the monster how to be bad

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 - EP 14
programme.desc: Po and the team have one last attempt to get the pendant, but they will have to disrupt Jayesh's wedding, and contend with his guards, to do so. At the mage island, Klaus and Veruca get hold of the Tianshang helmet.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 - EP 15
programme.desc: Mr. Ping is possessed by the ghost of Master Mastodon, the ancient master sworn to protect the Tianshang storm wheels. After a ghostly sewer chase, Mastodon agrees to help our team to stop Klaus and Veruca. He reveals that their next step is to go across the sea to Central America.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled S3 - EP 55

programme.title: Extraordinary Animals S2 - EP 7
programme.desc: Australia is one of the most diverse countries on earth with over 80percent of its animals found nowhere else in the world. This series explores wildlife's unique traits revealing the creative, aggressive, social and curious.

programme.title: Australia's Wild Moments S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: With hotter fires, wilder cyclones and the great melt of ice, the wildlife of Australia and its icy southern neighbour, Antarctica, is being impacted like never before.

programme.title: Pasin Wantok S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Formed in 1967 in Morobe, Langema String Band was a successful musical group that blended contemporary and traditional melodies.

programme.title: Australian Story (2025) - EP 37
programme.desc: She's flamboyant, provocative and brave. She's also married to David Walsh, founder of the Hobart-based MONA gallery. So why does artist and curator Kirsha Kaechele feel she's not taken seriously? (Final for 2025)

programme.title: The World (2025) - EP 178
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from ABC News correspondents as well as interviews with experts and guests.

programme.title: News Breakfast (2025) - EP 226
programme.desc: As the day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. Bridget Brennan and James Glenday bring you the latest news, overnight developments and today's top stories, joined by Charles Brice, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings (2025) - EP 226
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon (2025) - EP 226
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: National Press Club Address (2025) - EP 41
programme.desc: His Excellency Ambassador Kazuhiro Suzuki, Ambassador of Japan to Australia, addresses the National Press Club on the topic "Girt by sea and in the same boat: 50 years of Japan-Australia relations and beyond".

programme.title: Annabel Crabb's Civic Duty S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: We begin with one of the enduring oddities of the Australian electoral system - preferential voting. Vaunted by mathematicians and theorists as a fairer way of voting. Adopted, uniquely, by Australia in 1918.

programme.title: Media Watch (2025) - EP 40
programme.desc: New York's new millennial mayor offers a masterclass in political campaigning in the twilight of traditional media. A tech journalist pinged for gaming gadget reviews that are undisclosed ads. Plus Disney+ gambling loophole.

programme.title: Whitlam Dismissal: 50 Years
programme.desc: The dismissal of an elected Australian Government has only happened once. 50 years since Sir John Kerr sensationally sacked PM Gough Whitlam, Greg Jennett looks at the legacy of the historic event and how it shaped democracy.

programme.title: Voices of Independence S1 - EP 9
programme.desc: An influential leader of the Mataungan Association, Sir John Kaputin was a Tolai man who advocated for self-determination.

programme.title: Art Works S2 - EP 25
programme.desc: Hear from the creator of the Aussie musical about fandom that has fostered its own devotees; a Canberra coin designer; and amateur musicians who performed with the WASO, as well as poems from the National Poetry Month Gala.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing (2025) - EP 208
programme.desc: Your daily download of everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs. Patricia Karvelas asks politicians the tough questions and talks to key players and experts on the issues driving the news cycle.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien (2025) - EP 208
programme.desc: Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: The Chef's Garden S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Chef Massimo Melo discovers Tasmania's fresh local produce along with his beloved recipes, from Italian homely gnocchi made from scratch to exquisite abalone caught fresh from the sea.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - My Garden Path S33 - EP 22
programme.desc: We meet Sophie Kurylowicz who has channelled her love of gardening into a home flower farm that has connected her to her local community.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show S5 - EP 39
programme.desc: It's the season finale of That Pacific Sports Show! Tiana Penitani Gray, Sam Wykes, Sera Naiqama and Tinirau Arona wrap up 2025 with highlights, special guests, and powerful Pasifika performances. (Final for 2025)

programme.title: ABC National News (2025) - EP 316
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the day's top stories and latest news, with more reporters to tell you what's going on and why it matters. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: 7.30 (2025) - EP 179
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus reporting from Michael Rowland, Jacob Greber and the team.

programme.title: Whitlam Dismissal: 50 Years
programme.desc: The dismissal of an elected Australian Government has only happened once. 50 years since Sir John Kerr sensationally sacked PM Gough Whitlam, Greg Jennett looks at the legacy of the historic event and how it shaped democracy.

programme.title: Running Dry
programme.desc: The world is running out of water. Climate change, mismanagement and geopolitics are a drying up our reservoirs. The ripple effect is leaving millions struggling - there is hope but we must make every drop count.

programme.title: ABC Late News (2025) - EP 226

programme.title: Chips
programme.desc: Dax Shepard and Michael Pena star as the California Highway Patrol cops who form an unlikely partnership as they try to solve a heist involving some dirty cops.

programme.title: Angel Rodriguez
programme.desc: An HBO Original Movie, Angel Rodriguez tells the tale of Nicole, a social worker, and her relationship with Angel, a bright but troubled inner-city teen.

programme.title: Cellular
programme.desc: An abducted woman's only hope for rescue from ruthless kidnappers is to make one phone call to someone she doesn't even know.

programme.title: Fellow Traveller

programme.title: The Manchurian Candidate
programme.desc: After some troubling coincidences, an army officer questions if his Gulf War memories are real or if there is something sinister at stake.

programme.title: Depravity
programme.desc: Three neighbors uncover a hidden fortune in stolen art only to become trapped in a sadistic game of survival set by a suspected serial killer.

programme.title: Scary Movie 3
programme.desc: The third instalment of Scary Movie is one hell of a spoof of many a great movie.

programme.title: Argo
programme.desc: A daring CIA agent plans a fake movie set-up to rescue six Americans in Tehran.

programme.title: Warrior S3 - EP 7

programme.title: Monkey Man

programme.title: Money Movers - EP 1
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Money Movers - EP 2
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Halftime Report - EP 1
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day

programme.title: Halftime Report - EP 2
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC’s ‘The Exchange’ is the newsroom-based program for today’s investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Power Lunch - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Power Lunch - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Closing Bell - EP 1
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Closing Bell - EP 2
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime - EP 1
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime - EP 2
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Fast Money - EP 1
programme.desc: "Fast Money" is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: Fast Money - EP 2
programme.desc: "Fast Money" is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: Squawk Box Asia - EP 1
programme.desc: Squawk Box Asia is CNBC’s flagship show that sets the news agenda and takes viewers through the pre-game and the opening of Asia’s business trading day, covering the top market moving stories and views from the top CEOs, asset managers and newsmakers

programme.title: Squawk Box Asia - EP 2
programme.desc: Squawk Box Asia is CNBC’s flagship show that sets the news agenda and takes viewers through the pre-game and the opening of Asia’s business trading day, covering the top market moving stories and views from the top CEOs, asset managers and newsmakers

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. programme.title: Night Serial Drama "Hirayasumi" Eps. 7
programme.desc: A warm and bittersweet drama based on the internationally beloved manga by Shinzo Keigo. Ikuta Hiroto (Okayama Amane), 29, has no job, no romantic partner, and none of the usual worries about the future. Drawn to his easygoing personality, a local elderly woman gives him a single-story house. He begins living with his 18-year-old cousin Natsumi (Mori Nana), who has just moved to Tokyo from Yamagata. Before long, people carrying quiet burdens begin to gather around him.

programme.title: Are You Human? - EP 21
programme.desc: A young man falls into a coma. His mother creates an artificial intelligence robot in his likeness that must pretend to be a real human and fool people into believing that he's real until the real son wakes up. He is placed in the midst of a fierce power struggle of a business mogul family in the young man's stead. There's a woman who protects him as a bodyguard but doesn't even know if he's a human or a robot!

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2682
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. programme.title: Listen To Your Body

programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Adapted from the same-name novel, the drama features a minor official, Li Shande (Lei Jia Yin), during the Tang Dynasty. He overcomes numerous hardships and travels thousands of miles to deliver lychees from Gaozhou in Lingnan to Chang’an.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2079
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 6
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Forever Live Chairman Tung Kwai-shing hosts a press conference to offer a reward of HK$300 million for locating his missing daughter. Meanwhile, Lau Yu-fan asks Chow Chun-kit for help as he tells him about his missing daughter. And then Chow Chun-kit and Lau Yu-fan suspect the two missing person cases are related.

programme.title: The Wanted Detective - EP 13
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] On his wedding day, Xiao Bei Ming (Wang Xing Yue), the best detective of Qi, was framed as a demon and fled into the lake on the charge of murdering his master and treason. Three years later, he returned and joins a group of witty partners to seek justice.

programme.desc: Wai-lik and his team conduct a thorough search and manage to find some key evidence. Through comparative analysis, the charges against Yan-tat are eventually dropped. programme.desc: Tin-cho helps police decode something and manages to locate Perses, who is one of Chi-lok’s contacts on the dark web. Tin-cho asks Cheung Hei to come out of hiding and go after Perses.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 8
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Lau Yu-fan is bewildered as he abruptly receives a large sum of money from Tung Kwai-shing. And Chow Chun-kit gives him some bad news. A previously discovered human kidney was in fact Lau Wai-ling’s. Meanwhile, Tung Kwai-shing still prevents the duo from seeing Tung Sun-yuet, who has come round.

programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] On his wedding day, Xiao Bei Ming (Wang Xing Yue), the best detective of Qi, was framed as a demon and fled into the lake on the charge of murdering his master and treason. programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 13
programme.desc: A drunken Chi-lam crashes her car. Ka-pik offers some kind words to her. However, Ka-pik is ignored, causing her to instinctively recall some old story. Whenever Ho-yee goes to the nursing home, Hon-yeung is fast asleep. Hon-yeung eventually sees Ho-yee while he is awake. Hon-yeung decides to amend his will as he finds out what Sau-yi and Chi-bun have done.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 753
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Birth of A Hero - EP 17
programme.desc: To avoid all the strife caused by the gangland power struggles, YUK WAN-LUNG (Edwin Siu) and his elder sister YUK KIU-FUNG (Rachel Kan) lead a quiet life, running an inn. Unexpectedly, WAN-LUNG is determined to take part in the New Hero Contest, seeking to win his ex, NGAI BING-BING (Roxanne Tong), back. After WAN-LUNG exposes a scandal involving the East Wing imperial guards, he is incarcerated by SAU PAK-KWAN (Ben Wong), a commander of the East Wing.

programme.title: Just Love - EP 6
programme.desc: Judge KO HEI MAN (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER) and KOT KWOK KWONG (CHAN KAM HUNG, SUNNY) have agreed that MAN will concentrate on her career while KWONG will be taking care of the housework after they get married. Everything is in harmony until KWONG’s father discovers MAN and KWONG’s pre-marriage written agreement. Their relationship complicates ever since._x000D__x000D_ To make things worse, KWONG breaks the agreement and demands to have his own career.

programme.title: Get On A Flat - EP 2
programme.desc: Rewind to the 2008 financial crisis and supermarket manager Che Chi-ming (Andrew Lam) hurriedly sells his apartment. Who could have known even though Chi-ming has been chasing after property prices for 14 years, he still cannot get on the property ladder once again. A middle class lifestyle is tragically transformed into a "midlife crisis"._x000D__x000D_Chi-ming’s wife Man Wai (Elena Kong) is obsessed with property ownership. She goes to work as a part-time maid at some luxury home.

programme.title: Fist Within Four Walls, A - EP 11
programme.desc: CHOR AU-KUEN (Ruco Chan) bears the grief of the loss of his family and returns to the walled city in hopes of finding his long lost sister, only to find out that the place he grew up in has become a lawless no man's land. Concealing his real identity as a Bajiquan master, he creates a new identity and gets acquainted with a feisty hair salon lady boss, TIU LAN (Nancy Wu), a dentist, DUEN YING-FUNG (Benjamin Yuen), and a worker, BUT TAK-LIU (Lam Tsz Sin).

programme.title: Silver Spoon, Sterling Shackles - EP 12
programme.desc: During the 1930s in Hong Kong, where east meets west, feminist activists started campaigning for women's rights, seeking to uproot the phenomenon of men's superiority over women. Though having studied abroad in England and leading a western lifestyle, CHUNG CHEUK-MAN (Damian Lau) , a well-known Chinese barrister, is very traditional indeed.

programme.desc: Rewind to the 2008 financial crisis and supermarket manager Che Chi-ming (Andrew Lam) hurriedly sells his apartment. Who could have known even though Chi-ming has been chasing after property prices for 14 years, he still cannot get on the property ladder once again. A middle class lifestyle is tragically transformed into a "midlife crisis"._x000D__x000D_Chi-ming’s wife Man Wai (Elena Kong) is obsessed with property ownership. She goes to work as a part-time maid at some luxury home.

programme.title: Fist Within Four Walls, A - EP 11
programme.desc: CHOR AU-KUEN (Ruco Chan) bears the grief of the loss of his family and returns to the walled city in hopes of finding his long lost sister, only to find out that the place he grew up in has become a lawless no man's land. Concealing his real identity as a Bajiquan master, he creates a new identity and gets acquainted with a feisty hair salon lady boss, TIU LAN (Nancy Wu), a dentist, DUEN YING-FUNG (Benjamin Yuen), and a worker, BUT TAK-LIU (Lam Tsz Sin).

programme.title: Silver Spoon, Sterling Shackles - EP 12
programme.desc: During the 1930s in Hong Kong, where east meets west, feminist activists started campaigning for women's rights, seeking to uproot the phenomenon of men's superiority over women. Though having studied abroad in England and leading a western lifestyle, CHUNG CHEUK-MAN (Damian Lau) , a well-known Chinese barrister, is very traditional indeed.

programme.title: Birth of A Hero - EP 17
programme.desc: To avoid all the strife caused by the gangland power struggles, YUK WAN-LUNG (Edwin Siu) and his elder sister YUK KIU-FUNG (Rachel Kan) lead a quiet life, running an inn. Unexpectedly, WAN-LUNG is determined to take part in the New Hero Contest, seeking to win his ex, NGAI BING-BING (Roxanne Tong), back. After WAN-LUNG exposes a scandal involving the East Wing imperial guards, he is incarcerated by SAU PAK-KWAN (Ben Wong), a commander of the East Wing.

programme.title: Just Love - EP 6
programme.desc: Judge KO HEI MAN (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER) and KOT KWOK KWONG (CHAN KAM HUNG, SUNNY) have agreed that MAN will concentrate on her career while KWONG will be taking care of the housework after they get married. Everything is in harmony until KWONG’s father discovers MAN and KWONG’s pre-marriage written agreement. Their relationship complicates ever since._x000D__x000D_ To make things worse, KWONG breaks the agreement and demands to have his own career.
